transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello. Sir, Manoj ji baat kare?

Hanji.

Sir, mai Sawar Singh team se baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se senior manager. Sir, aapka na feedback aaya tha yaha pe, not satisfied ka over the call conversation jo aapki Alankrit Raj se hui thi sir.

To unse koi baat hi nahi hui meri.

Hanji? Unse unse meri koi baat hi nahi hui.

Achha baat nahi hui hai? Baat hi hui hai.

Uh, kis se baat hui? Kis se baat hui?

Pragati se hui hai.

Achha Pragati mam se baat hui hai?

Haa.

Okay okay okay. Sir, unke matlab aaya to call Alankrit Raj ke feedback pe aaya hai not satisfied karke. To mai yahi janna chah raha tha sir unse koi issues vagerah the aapko? Kyunki management me aapka. Wo Pragati mam ko sara malum hai Alankrit se mere kya issue the.
Haa. Unke kya complaint thi, unhone kya jhooth sach bola sab Pragati mam ko malum hai. Aap unse puch sakte hai.

Haa haa Pragati mam. To sir yaha pe head of the department hi hai na matlab iska. Haa to unhone hamare Pragati mam ke beech me galat tarah ki matlab create kiya.

Okay. Jhooth bol ke.

Mere bare me jhooth bol ke Alankrit ji unko bataya. Aur jab kal sath me teeno ki conference hui tab pata laga Pragati ne unko bola bhi.

Are unhone bola maine jhooth nahi bola, jhooth nahi bola.

Okay. Unhone accept kiya usko.

Sir, mai recording line se baat kar raha hu aur ye call jo hai aage jo hai jo escalation manager hai koi dikkat nahi hai. Unse hi unke paas hi jayegi. Aap mujhe bata sakte hai ek bari kya aapko jhooth bola tha kya tha sir concern?

Hae?

Sir, kya jhooth bola tha ek bari thoda sa? Mujhe kuch kuch kuch din pehle unka call aaya tha mere paas. Thik hai. Aur unka jyadatar jab bhi call aaya aapka ye renew karne ka hai, aapka ye package hai, aapko hum ye discount de denge wo de denge. Meri kya problem hai uska solution unke paas 50-60% hi nahi tha. Pahli baat. Dusri baat last jab unse meri baat hui unhone fir bola ki bhai aapka ye aane wala hai renew hoga October me shayad unhone time me yaad nahi hai last call jab aaya tha. Okay. Unhone kaha ki aapka aane wala hai to abhi hum aapko naya kuch wo package me aapko discount vagerah karte hai na wo de denge. Aap dekhiye mujhe hamara abhi tak saal bhar me koi achha experience IndiaMART ke sath nahi raha hai. Abhi tak hamara koi bhi dhyan nahi hai karne ka. November jab aayega 20-25 ke aas paas tab dekha jayega. Achha. Itni mujhse baat hui. Unhone is baat ko forward kar diya ki customer accept kar liya hai ki unko renew karna hai agar aap unko kuch achha discount dete hai to wo renew karne ke liye tayar hai aur is hisab se unhone naya packaging ko present kiya waha par. Ki Manoj ji pura accept kar liya Manoj ji ne us package ko naya package ko aur agar aapko discount karte hai to wo agree hai. Jabki aisi hamari unke sath koi bhi baat nahi hui. Ye unhone bahut bada jhooth bola.

Okay. Uh, sir matlab aisa koi baat nahi hui aur wo cheez bol di ki aapne accept kar liya is cheez ke regarding aur. Haa. Pehle Pragati mam ka mere paas phone aaya. Wo boli ki Alankrit ne bola ki aapne usko accept kar liya hai. Tari bhai koi discount ya uske baad hamari unse koi baat hi nahi hui. Humne ye bola jab 25 tarikh hai tab dekha jayega. Abhi hamara saal bhar ka experience ko aisa nahi hai isliye hamara renew karne ka koi bhi dhyan nahi hai. Ye baat unke sath hui. Jabki unhone unko bataya ki Manoj ji se baat ho gayi hai aur unhone naya package naya jo renew karna hai usko accept kar liya hai. Aage wo discount vagerah kuch puch rahe the koi iska discount wo bataiye. Jabki aisi koi baat nahi hui. Sir is tarah se present nahi karna chahiye galat hai.

Nahi bilkul baat sahi hai sir. Maine abhi check kiya aapki history abhi to Pragati mam hi personally shayad aapka case ab handle kar rahi hai yaha pe. Wo unhone unhone ye mention kara hua hai ki koi ispe mere se bina puche call na le. Koi customer ko koi kisi tarah ka update na de aise kuch aur mere khyal se Alankrit ji ko ek warning mail bhi issue kar rakha hai unhone yaha pe sir. Iske regarding. Ye bata dijiye ki ye aapka matter hai dekhiye. Hanji hanji hanji. Matlab unhone warning se jude hue hai. Hanji hanji hanji. Wo dekhiye jo sahi kal kareeb mujhse kam aadhi ghanta Pragati mam se meri baat hui. Hanji. Mere jo bhi issue the jo bhi bolna tha maine unko bola aap unse puchiyega kya kya baat hui. Correct correct sir correct. Meri baate unko achhi lagi ya wo unka matter hai dekhiye. Hanji hanji hanji. Nahi nahi unhone meri baat ye hai ki ye jo package hai wo aap mujhe bhej dijiye. Unhone mujhe amount bhi bataya. Unhone mujhse pucha ki ye kab tak karne ka program hai aapka? Hanji. To bhai hamari date hai 20-25 tarikh ki hai shayad. Ji ji. Unka kehna tha. Maine kaha ki aapko uski darkar nahi hai aur kisi ko boliyega mujhe uske baad bar bar ye to kya hota hai aapke yaha se call aana chalu ho jata hai. Sir aap kar rahe hai kya do ghanta me kar rahe hai ya char ghanta me kar rahe hai. Maine kal unko bhi bol diya aapko call ki koi darkar nahi padegi. Next week ya isi week me jab bhi mujhe suvidha hogi mai karke aapko bhej dunga. Nahi bilkul baat sahi hai. Aur ek saal ka unhone mujhe assurance diya hai. Haa. Ki ek saal aap karke dekhiye chhe mahine me isko fayda padega aur chhe mahine baad mai aapse baat karungi aap khud bolenge ki is package ko aap aur aage badha dijiye aur badha dijiye. Nahi maine ji bilkul sir maine ye check kiya wo personally aapka case hi aapka hi handle kar rahe hai. Mai actually mai to VOC voice of customer team se hi tha to yaha se maine check kiya tab date kiya tha aapka complaint yaha pe raise hua tha not satisfied ka to maine call kiya ki Alankrit ke upar aise kuch. Uske upar to aaya ki bhai aap satisfied I was not satisfied satisfied likhunga na mai to. Haa. Mai Alankrit se satisfied nahi hu to mai likhunga. Ji ji ji ji. Koi issue nahi hai sir mai yaha se na agar aapko package me sath issue hai. Ji. Jis din suvidha mujhe suvidha milegi aage program kiya hua hai. Hanji. Jab aayega to Pragati mam ka bhi number mere paas hai mai unse phone pe khud se baat karunga. Haan haan bilkul sir aap Pragati mam ko kar lijiyega koi issue nahi hai. Iske liye aapke hawale se koi bar bar. Nahi nahi sir unhone update kar unhone update kara hua hai iske bare me aap nishchint rahiye unhone unhone unhone update kar diya hai to aap iske liye nishchint rahiye apne aap time pe chala jayega. Thik hai sir thik hai. Ji ji thik hai. Okay sir okay okay thank you. Aapka naam? Thank you. Sir mera naam Rahul hai sir. Okay okay Rahul ji thank you. Okay sir okay thank you okay okay thank you. Haa bolo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Received a 'not satisfied' feedback call.

- Alankrit misrepresented customer's renewal intentions.

- Customer faced issues with Alankrit's service.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the situation and apologized.

- Executive confirmed Pragati is handling the case.

- Executive assured issue will be resolved.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact Pragati directly.



Alert (If Any):

- complaint



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, misrepresentation, renewal, discount, satisfaction
